item.title: Claude's Flattery and Pessimistic Prompting
item.description:
I’ve been interviewing for a new role recently! Unlike the last time I was on the market, there’s fun new AI tooling to help me.

I’ve been pretty impressed with Claude and Claude Codes (CC) â€“ it’s been incredibly helpful for banal things like debugging a SQL CREATE VIEW and batch-editing 25+ build.gradle files. It’s also great for code review, but it’s also dangerous: even when I thought I was being careful, it was easy for a skeptical, vigilant, and strikingly handsome (Claude said so!) developer like myself to be lulled into a false sense of security about my code.
